comments:
If a (http)proxy is defined when geclipse starts, and deactivated afterwards ("direct connection to the internet") without restarting, a New SRM Grid Connection still tries to use the http proxy, Event detail log is:

; nested exception is: 
	java.net.UnknownHostException: proxy.fzk.de
